comment.body: they said 'yet'. so next time, you'll be prepared! the world just need a little more time to be ready.
@Nofish: yeah, but as decentralized technologies like blockchain / bitcoin / ethereum / smart contract adaptations moving forward, this will change.

I also think that we shouldn't rely on the sum of what happened (the experience you got) minus what we're hoped for (expectations), because it'll be negative, but in the end of the day, they only thing that matters (which is really happened), that you're smarter than before :) (IMHO)
